tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE restock_history (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id UUID,
    restock_quantity INTEGER,
    restock_date DATE,
    restock_time TIME
);
CREATE TABLE inventory_items (  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,  stock_level INT NOT NULL,  restock_threshold INT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE restock_alerts (  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  item_id INT NOT NULL,  alert_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,  alert_message TEXT NOT NULL,  FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES inventory_items(item_id) );
CREATE TABLE users (  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE notifications (  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  user_id INT NOT NULL,  notification_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  notification_text TEXT NOT NULL,  notification_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) );

CREATE TABLE restock_history (  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  item_id INT NOT NULL,  restock_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,  restock_amount INT NOT NULL,  FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES inventory_items(item_id) );
